ComicInfo.Summary:
MAD #521 is on sale now – complete with our full spoof of Game of Thrones! We also mock James Bond and Skyfall, gun shows, baseball and the iPad mini!! Plus, Planet Tad, the MAD Fold-In, Spy vs. Spy, the MAD Strip Club, the Darker Side of the Lighter Side, Man Boobs Vol. 3 and much, much more! So hurry up and get it today – winter is coming! (In another 6 months…but by then this issue won’t be on sale anymore!)
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:28:47. [Issue ID 404805]
